title: 5/25/17 - The Only Topic We Should Be Discussing?
description:
Congressional candidate vs. Reporter in Montana turns ugly ...Is it better for the GOP to have their candidate lose today in Montana? ...Listeners torn on Greg Gianforte ...Who the face of the GOP could be for the next 18 months ...Glenn's terrible experience with Katie Couric ...Another horrific Planned Parenthood video. How did we not stop this? ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
